name: 國際企業管理
description: This course focuses on the challenges and opportunities associated with organizational management and business strategy in the global environment. The International Business Management course is intended to be a challenging advanced management course for the business student.  Students will gain a general overview of the process and effect of internationalization in contemporary business, along with an introduction to theories, concepts and skills relevant to managing effectively in today’s global environment.
goals: gain a general overview of the process and effect of internationalization in contemporary business
introduce to theories, concepts and skills relevant to managing effectively in today’s global environment
integrate knowledge they have gained from other business core courses
apply their accumulated knowledge to business case studies.
active research and analytical problem-solving related to managing in the international environment
syllabus:
teaching arrangement:16 week+2week

This course focuseson the challenges and opportunities associated with organizational managementand business strategy in the global environment. The International Management course is intended to be a challengingadvanced management course for the business student.  Students will gain ageneral overview of the process and effect of internationalization incontemporary business, along with an introduction to theories, concepts andskills relevant to managing effectively in today’s global environment. Students will be challenged to integrate knowledge they have gained from otherbusiness core courses and apply their accumulated knowledge to business casestudies.  Students will engage in active research and analytical problem-solving related to managing in the international environment and willfrequently be called upon to brief their findings to the class.

methodologies.note: 講述國際企業管理核心理論與分析架構為主
以哈佛個案為基礎討論國際環境、策略、多國企業功能政策與組織結構與執行問題。以參與者為中心的教學方法。學生必須於上課前小組討論，上課時聆聽老師問題，同學回答，教師利用問答方式引導學生思考，比較與整合多元意見，分析與抽象化課堂討論內容的結果。
利用課堂知識應用於評估產品之海外市場決策
